availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Aaron W. Blakeman (Green County, Kentucky, farmer. Also in KYR-0001-020-0478 and KYR-0001-020-2348.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. Green County, Kentucky, resident. Son of James Blakeman and Elizabeth Blakeman. Resident of Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Laborer in Green County in 1860. Hired two enslaved persons in Green County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 97B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 559.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 73A.
